title: Play Nexus Blitz, and the climate crashed, and I got banned
body: I played Nexus Blitz these days, and my climated crashed for several times, and today my climate crashed again, and I got banned, it is the climate problem, not because I left the game, please cancel the ban. {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
Heya,

Could you provide me with the following info;

1. Your CPU type / Processor 
2. Your GPU / Graphics card

Climate?
Do you mean client or are you talking about the weather?

Pls Pls Pls be quickly !!!! 
I don't want get banned!!!!
